#summary Plugin execution and configuration procedure v0.12.

= Introduction =

This manual will explain how to execute and configure Subs Downloader plugin.


= Details =
*1)* To execute plugin press:
  - Menu on Your remote,
  - then choose plugin submenu,
  - and finally choose plugin icon (as below)

http://subs-downloader.googlecode.com/svn/files/pictures/wiki/exec_config/plugin_icon.jpg
